video.title: Longchenpa - A Meditation on the Advantages of a Human Rebirth - Dzogchen
video.description:
This is a reading of the chapter on Human Birth from Finding Rest in the Nature of Mind (Volume 1). Translated by the Padmakara translation group. You can find the book to purchase here: https://www.shambhala.com/finding-rest-in-the-nature-of-the-mind-14951.html

Longchenpa, also known as Longchen Rabjam , ‘Infinite, Vast Expanse of Space’, or Drimé Özer (1308-1364), was one of the most brilliant teachers of the Nyingma lineage. He systematized the Nyingma teachings in his ‘Seven Treasures’ and wrote extensively on Dzogchen.

Music by Wings of an Angel - with immense thanks to Wings for the offering of his music for this collaboration. Please see his extensive range of music here: https://wingsofanangel.bandcamp.com/
